entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
